Question: In June 1975, the ____ 5 signed with Epic Records, a subsidiary of CBS Records and renamed themselves the ____s.
Hints: Responding to the gossip, this person remarked to Taraborrelli:.
This person performed 82 concerts in 58 cities to over 4.5 million fans, and grossed a total of $165 million.
On June 13, 2005, this person was acquitted on all counts.
